sentences.en: A cold is an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 感冒是上呼吸道的感染。

sentences.en: Air pollution contributes to respiratory diseases.
sentences.cn: 空气污染可促使呼吸系统疾病发生.
我们强调精心的呼吸护理.

sentences.en: He had an infection in the upper respiratory tract.
He's suffering from an acute infection of the lower respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 他患有急性下呼吸道感染.

sentences.en: If you smoke then the whole respiratory system is constantly under attack.
sentences.cn: 如果抽烟，整个呼吸系统就会一直受到损害。

sentences.en: Respiratory infections may also initiate excerbations.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道感染也可能使病情加重.

sentences.en: Respiratory tract fluid is the major product of the normal lung.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道液体是正常肺的主要产物.

sentences.en: Some respiratory symptoms can be the forerunners of asthma.
sentences.cn: 一些呼吸道症状可能是哮喘病的先兆。

sentences.en: The old man suffers from respiratory diseases.
sentences.cn: 那位老人患呼吸道疾病.

sentences.en: The respiratory tract conveys oxygen - rich air to the lungs.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道给肺输送 富氧 的空气.

sentences.en: The secretory system of the respiratory tract is probably the most appreciated.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道的分泌系统可能是最先被意识到的.

sentences.en: These gases would seriously damage the patient's respiratory system.
sentences.cn: 这些毒气会严重损害患者的呼吸系统。

sentences.en: This applies to most respiratory infections ( e . g . mycoplasma infections, infectious coryza, laryngotracheitis ).
sentences.cn: 大多数呼吸道感染都如此,如支原体感染, 传染性鼻炎, 喉气管炎.

sentences.en: Until the age of seven, respiratory movement is abdominal.
sentences.cn: 在七岁以前呼吸运动是腹式的.

words.tran_cn: 口罩；[医] 呼吸器；防毒面具

phrases.tran_cn: 呼吸功能不全；呼吸衰竭
严重急性呼吸系统综合症

trans.tran_en: relating to breathing or your lungs
